channel.title: Item id help
channel.description: For an item to appear does the id have to be the same on the client file class8.java as on the server file item.cfg??

item.title: Item id help
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

The cfg file on the server is just for loading the item name recognized by the server and the bonuses of the item.
Putting it in that file is not necessary, but should be done anyways.
Also, this belongs in the Client Hacking Section.

Read full topic
